Uses of Interface
jdraw.framework.DrawModel

  • Packages that use DrawModel 
    Package Description
    jdraw.framework
    Contains all interfaces and implementations of the base framework of the JDraw editor.
    jdraw.std
    Contains standard implementations of framework interfaces.

    • Uses of DrawModel in jdraw.framework

      Methods in jdraw.framework that return DrawModel 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DrawModel DrawContext.getModel()
      Returns the draw model presented by this context's view.
      DrawModel DrawModelEvent.getModel()
      Returns the draw model which changed.
      DrawModel DrawView.getModel()
      Returns the graphic model of this view.
      Constructors in jdraw.framework with parameters of type DrawModel 
      Constructor Description
      DrawModelEvent​(DrawModel source, Figure figure, DrawModelEvent.Type type)
      Constructs a DrawModelEvent object with the specified model.

    • Uses of DrawModel in jdraw.std

      Classes in jdraw.std that implement DrawModel 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  StdDrawModel
      Provide a standard behavior for the drawing model.
      Methods in jdraw.std that return DrawModel 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DrawModel AbstractContext.getModel()  
      DrawModel StdDrawView.getModel()  
      Methods in jdraw.std with parameters of type DrawModel 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void StdContext.bringToFront​(DrawModel model, List<Figure> selection)
      Changes the order of figures and moves the figures in the selection to the front, i.e.
      void StdContext.sendToBack​(DrawModel model, List<Figure> selection)
      Changes the order of figures and moves the figures in the selection to the back, i.e.
      Constructors in jdraw.std with parameters of type DrawModel 
      Constructor Description
      RemoveFigureCommand​(DrawModel model, Figure figure)
      To remove a figure we must know its identity and the model from which it should be removed.
      StdDrawView​(DrawModel aModel)
      Creates a new StdDrawView.
